about_the_game:
"

Star System Set: Frentellis Prime (FULL SET)


FRENTELLIS PRIME
STAR SYSTEM SET




by Michael Allen
and Colin Stricklin




The primary star of the

Frentellis

AB binary star system is a destination system, not only for shipping companies exploiting the lush agricultural planet of

Frentellis

4, but also the pirates and raiders that prey upon their convoys. Further crowding the shipping lanes are living ships: bioships that easily host alien crews, oftentimes integrating their technology into their organic structures. These ships, normally shepherded by a race
known
as t
he wranglers,
provide additional cargo capacity for the greedy shipping concerns of the

Frentellis

Prime Consortium.




This
stand-alone
star system set
integrates
well
with

The Breakers
'
Yard
(Frentellis B)


star system set as well as the first-level adventure
:

Earl Grey, Hot

for those
groups
wishing to spend more gaming time in this sector
.




Included in this star system set:




  • Alien Race:
    The
    Wranglers

  • Planet:
    The Frentellis
    Prime
    S
    ystem
  • Monsters:
    Implantacle,

    Pla


    s


    macroc

    , Rogue Antibody
  • Character Options:
    New
    Archetype
    :
    Bonded Pilot
    ;
    New Spells
    :
    Befriend Ship
    ,

    Junkbot

    Armor

  • Equipment:
    Bioship
    s:
    Expansion
    b
    ays, Lifecycles,
    Ship designs, and
    notes on running un
    -
    crewed
    (wild)
    and crewed (Including PCs) living ships.

  • Mini-Adventure:
    The Deep End of the Pool




Star System Sets offer new planets to explore, dangers to overcome, lifeforms to study, and cultures to document.
Modular enough for any campaign, each double-sided card presents a complete ruleset for ease of reference, allowing GMs to fill in the blank spots on their star charts.






Card types include Race, Planet, Character Options, Equipment, Monsters, and Mini-Adventure.



"
